settings.title: OUR STORY
settings.subtitle: For over 30 years, Zero Restriction has set the standard for performance without limits, blending innovative waterproof technology with uncompromising freedom of movement.

settings.text: Discover our exclusive line of high-performance running apparel, meticulously designed for trail enthusiasts. These garments are crafted to elevate your running experience, pushing the boundaries of comfort and style while creating new pathways in the running community.
settings.title: U.S Open 2025
settings.label: Shop Now

settings.title: The Zero Restriction Story
settings.subtitle: Three friends, with one shared goal: To revolutionize the sensation of running.

settings.title: Diversity, equity and inclusion
settings.des: Transparency remains key for continued growth and accountability. Our latest figures can be found in the On Impact Progress Report. As well as improving from within, we also want to do our part to change the running world for the better. This means partnering with those who inspire us, working closely with incredible community-led programs and organisations.

settings.title: How to drive a golf ball
settings.content: Driving Tips Sadly, the summer golf season is now behind us. Our chances of winning major club competitions or golf days will now have to wait until next year.

settings.title: Personalised golf clothing and accessories for corporate and golf societies
settings.content: We have launched a bespoke and personalised service for companies and golf societies which caters to the unique needs of groups looking for personalised golf clothing, balls and accessories

settings.title: Guide to The Masters
settings.content: We have made it! We’ve slogged through the cold days and dark nights of winter. The clocks have gone forward and spring is here. In golf terms we have waited nine long

settings.title: A more sustainable future
settings.des: We believe progress lies in technological innovation. Experimenting better. From the humble garden hose stapled to the outsole of our first prototype – all the way to our ultimate vision of building a brighter future with fossil-free materials and circular systems.

settings.label: The Beginning
settings.info: Founded in a rural Pennsylvania barn, Zero Restriction was born from one golfer’s frustration with rain gear that limited movement. Using outdoor-grade materials, he created the first “Guaranteed Waterproof for Life” jacket that allowed a full golf swing, setting a new standard in performance outerwear.

settings.label: The Breakthrough
settings.info: Zero Restriction became a fixture on professional tours, earning legendary status when Payne Stewart cut the sleeves off his ZR jacket at the 1999 U.S. Open. That moment unintentionally created the iconic half-sleeve category and symbolized true freedom of motion.

settings.label: The Recognition
settings.info: Continuing its tradition of outfitting champions, Zero Restriction became the Official Outerwear Sponsor for Team USA at the Solheim Cup. The brand’s commitment to advanced performance design and craftsmanship solidified its reputation on the global stage.

settings.label: The Evolution
settings.info: When Tiger Woods selected ZR as the Preferred Outerwear Provider for the Presidents Cup, it marked a defining moment in the brand’s legacy and reinforced its position as the trusted choice for elite athletes facing the toughest conditions.

settings.label: The Future
settings.info: Over three decades later, Zero Restriction continues to push the boundaries of performance technology, merging precision engineering with refined style. The mission remains unchanged: to craft apparel that performs like equipment and gives players a true competitive edge.

settings.name: WATERPROOF
settings.content: Fully seam-sealed design with high-quality multi-layered coated fabrics so you’re free to get out and stay out.

settings.name: WINDPROOF
settings.content: Don’t let a blustery day hold you back. Our lightweight windproof layers are engineered for comfort, protection and freedom of movement.

settings.name: MOTION TUNED
settings.content: Through a strategic blend of fabric and design, our layers allow for a greater range of motion, increased flexibility and a better fit.
